mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from board order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from board where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
select count(*) from board where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: update board set step=step+1 where ref=#{ref} and step>=#{step}
update board set reply = reply+1 where seq=#{pseq}
